alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:53AM CDT until April 16 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Merrill affecting Lincoln and Marathon Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River below Alexander Reservoir affecting Lincoln County. Wisconsin River below Wausau affecting Marathon County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Merrill. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Several feet of water may be covering area parks and lowland in Merrill. Floodwaters reach the base of the river gauging station. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Thursday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 5.7 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
